As the Decepticons and Predicons open up on the sweeps, the we=
apons bite through armor=A0destroying many of them=A0in a cecophony of expl=
osions, the sounds ripping across the open air light thunder. The autoguns =
from the base peppered the skies, raking through the host dropping many fro=
m the skies! Even as the combined firepower of the=A0defenders raged across=
 them the sweeps moved out into a slightly wider arc, seperating so as not =
to present such an easy target. With one accord thier own disintergrator ca=
nnons opened up, tearing into the earth below them as they targetted the ba=
se and the defenders!
As Jhiaxus moved in to dogfight the sweeps, his weapo=
ns burning into them, they quickly spin out of his way, thier movements qui=
ck and supple as they manuvered. However as he moved forward he realized th=
at it was not the effectiveness of his weapons that gained him the advantag=
e, but it was the design of the sweeps! As they swung away from before him,=
 they were closing in behind him, boxing him in, thier powerful canons firi=
ng. 
Just as the sweeps were fulling closing the trap on Jhiaxus, a few of =
those to his rear exploded and began falling from the skies as Myrmidon, no=
w in starfighter mode caught up, his cannons cutting a swath of wreckage th=
rough the air. "I would not recommend seperating from the group." the 6-cha=
nger's voice cut through the channels. "There are so many of them, we could=
 all be cut off. We need reinforcments! " 
Myrmidon banked to the left and =
up slightly as the sweeps tried to box him in also, with thier numbers, it =
was possible if they were not extremely careful!
(OOC: In addition to the d=
efenders, the sweeps are definitely targetting the base, are thier weapons =

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Jhiaxus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: Mwahaha! They are pathetic throwbacks!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus' boasts are stopped as he realized that although he was effective, the Sweeps had changes strategy and were boxing him in. Suddenly some of the rear Sweeps were destroyed by Myrmidon. Jhiaxus banks out of the trap with him.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: I hate to say this but I wish the Maximals would fight back more...</P>
<P> </P>
<P>As Sweeps moved into position to box in Jhiaxus again. Jhiaxus pulls up and performs a 360 degree dive, ending up behind the approaching Sweeps. He fires all rockets and lasers.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>OOC: That is supposed to be the "Top Gun" manuver.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 6/21/08, Super Cyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: All Out War<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Saturday, June 21, 2008, 7:57 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1315570410>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P>As the Decepticons and Predicons open up on the sweeps, the weapons bite through armor destroying many of them in a cecophony of explosions, the sounds ripping across the open air light thunder. The autoguns from the base peppered the skies, raking through the host dropping many from the skies! Even as the combined firepower of the defenders raged across them the sweeps moved out into a slightly wider arc, seperating so as not to present such an easy target. With one accord thier own disintergrator cannons opened up, tearing into the earth below them as they targetted the base and the defenders!<BR>As Jhiaxus moved in to dogfight the sweeps, his weapons burning into them, they quickly spin out of his way, thier movements quick and supple as they manuvered. However as he moved forward he realized that it was not the effectiveness of his weapons that gained him the advantage, but it was the design of the sweeps! As they swung away from
 before him, they were closing in behind him, boxing him in, thier powerful canons firing. <BR>Just as the sweeps were fulling closing the trap on Jhiaxus, a few of those to his rear exploded and began falling from the skies as Myrmidon, now in starfighter mode caught up, his cannons cutting a swath of wreckage through the air. "I would not recommend seperating from the group." the 6-changer's voice cut through the channels. "There are so many of them, we could all be cut off. We need reinforcments! " <BR>Myrmidon banked to the left and up slightly as the sweeps tried to box him in also, with thier numbers, it was possible if they were not extremely careful!<BR>(OOC: In addition to the defenders, the sweeps are definitely targetting the base, are thier weapons having any effect?)<BR>Preston<BR>(Da'minion)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
